Text: Trump: I’m Reopening 9/11 Investigation  If this account is true–unless Trump merely intends to blame the Saudis which would be a continuation of the cover-up in different clothes–the CIA, Mossad, and the neocon nazis will kill him before he is inaugerated.   http://investmentwatchblog.com/trump-im-reopening-911-investigation/   The post Trump: I’m Reopening 9/11 Investigation appeared first on PaulCraigRoberts.org .
